in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. " Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game. of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting Feb. 28. A Jan. 17 statement by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer emphasized Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. Microsoft finds itself locked in fierce battle for CRM market-share with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals.
